name: feedpon
description: The feed reader to change the world

scripts.build: npm run-script browserify && npm run-script uglify
scripts.browserify: browserify src/js/app.js --ignore crypto --transform [ babelify --extensions .js,.ts ] --plugin [ tsify --target ES6 --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata ] --outfile public/app.js
scripts.watchify: watchify src/js/app.js --verbose --ignore crypto --transform [ babelify --extensions .js,.ts ] --plugin [ tsify  --target ES6 --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata ] --outfile public/app.js

author: Shota Nozaki
